website_summaries.verdict: A durable and stylish bag your guests can use for years.
pros: Spacious interior holds a soccer ball with room to spare
Bags are reusable and machine wash safe
Perfect for holding additional party favors
Double stitched with reinforced leather corners
cons: You may need to burn the ends of the rope to prevent them from coming untied

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic. Ordered for kids birthday and the order was cancelled day before because they had some problem. Had to buy much more expensive alternate product
customer_reviews.author: srinivas

customer_reviews.title: 😍😘
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 sets of bags for my students to use for field trips. These bags are perfect. They were all super well made, screen printing spot on for all 40. The only "issue " was that some of the strings were not tied well but I didn't mind tying up loose ends and burning ends so they don't unravel. I don't consider this a flaw, just teacher OCD! Great product. Will buy again in future when needed.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong stringbags
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered these emoji favor bags for my daughter's 10th birthday party. I was absolutely blown away by the excellent service provided by BeeGreen Bags Ltd! I placed the order on Saturday morning and by 7pm the same day my package was delivered! The bags themselves are sturdy and super cute! I can't wait to give them out to our young guests this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Gemco

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These I bought for goodie bags for my grandsons birthday party! Huge hit, even the parents wanted one. Made well, great graphics, bright colors! Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Nola Tainter

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as a tutor to give away in an award ceremony. Each kiddo got their own "face" for individuality. They were a hit and my own children use them now. We carry them everywhere- water inside of them for hikes, toys for church, and even to hold a change of clothes after the pool. I love them in a crowd of people so that I can always see where my children are. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: WiseSoul

customer_reviews.title: Great party favor!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out as party favors for my son's birthday party and they were well-received by our guests. My son loves his own. :) They come with varying designs, so each one is different. I have seen friends use them over and over, so I'm quite pleased others find them so appealing as well! The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn W.

customer_reviews.title: Emoji bags
customer_reviews.text: These were cute. I bought them for gym bags (ones that my elementary kids can through in their book bags and then into a locker without losing anything) and Awana bags (church after school thing where they bring a pencil and workbook with them) and so far they seem to be sturdy and very functional. Most of the faces are cute but there a few i have a feeling my kids will never touch like the heart eyes and crazy eyes. I have girls so it's not the reason why...
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these bags! Definitely worth it! Got them for my 9 year old daughter birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Paulukonis

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool Drawstring Bags!
customer_reviews.text: What a blast these drawstring bags were! I ordered them for my boy's party and gave them away as loot bags! I threw so many things in there as the party progressed, prizes, cups, small toys, candy!
customer_reviews.author: AMcM

customer_reviews.title: The girls loved them and they are a great size for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these as prize options for our girls for summer camp. They are the cutest bags ever. The girls loved them and they are a great size for kids. Many of these string bags are so huge on little kids, but these actually fit really nice and don't sag down like the other ones do. They seemed good quality. The girls put their art canvas and other projects in them without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Littlemidget

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, quick customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good bags. I purchased 130 of them to distribute on the last day of school. One set out of 13 came short a bag. The company responded quickly with a replacement product. Unfortunately it wasn't the same bags so I couldn't use the replacements at school. We put yearbooks, pens and candy in the bags before distribution. Everything fit with room for more. Drawstrings were not too long or too short for 11 year old kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Pyatt6

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect! A big hit with the kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought these bags as favors for my son's 12th birthday. They were perfect! A big hit with the kids. They're great quality - strong, thick material and they have reinforced corners for the cords. So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: There okay bags
customer_reviews.text: They are not tied very well they came untied several times and one of the strings on a bag were frayed so that bag isn't going to last long. Other then that great bags
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Baughman

customer_reviews.title: These backpacks are the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: The only regret I have about ordering these is that I got the 24 and 10, (I needed a total of 34) but these are so great, I wish I would have ordered 48 and had extras. I don’t even have one for myself; in truth I would have loved to have one of each of the different emojis and I’m 58 yrs old! These backpacks are everything you would want: great quality fabric, well constructed, super cute; both girls and boys were so excited to get them—finding party favors that 11 year olds will love is no easy task.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! I have 8 young family members that get holiday gifts from me, 6 of which are 3000 miles away. I used these bags in place of baskets for their Easter gifts. They fit lots of stuff, can be used as backpacks after the holiday and seemed plenty durable, although the 2- & 3-year-olds will probably test that better than I could. LOL I love that there's 10 different designs, so each kid got his/her own unique bag, thus avoiding fights about ownership. I also love that the back of each bag is blank, allowing me to personalize each bag if I'd wanted to and had the time. I'm definitely going to buy them again sometime soon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ladyshelby

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Got these for return gifts for my sons birthday party (10 year old ) . Looks good for the money . Looks perfect for carrying stuff for day hike , weekend games.. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LiveLife

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter's party!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these bags! I ordered them as gift bags for my daughter's party and they fit everything (even the blown up 12" beach balls!). They're well made, the colors are bright, and came in great shape! They were the perfect touch for the party, and the kids (and let's face it, the adults as well) loved them. This is something they can use for a while to come! SO WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deniece Black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kid's party goody bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as goody bags for my son's 4th birthday party. They were only a bit more expensive than standard gift bags, and were a huge hit with the kids! We put an activity/coloring book, set of crayons, playdoh, pack of fruit snacks, and stickers in each one.
customer_reviews.author: SPinDC

customer_reviews.title: SO WORTH IT!! Forget the kids...YOU will love them!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these!!!! AAAHHHHH!!!! They are so cute, I frigging want one!!! LOL got them as a prize item for the kids slumber party. Thought they were so cute and a good token gift for all the kids to have to remember for all here. Love it and what an amazing price for a cute gift!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited with these bags. I was worried after reading others reviews, but took a chance and I'm so happy I did. The bags are a bright yellow with cute faces. The bags are thin, but seem to be fairly sturdy. They are perfect for my daughter's birthday party gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: Toni England

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got these bags as part of a gift for the students who I teach. They loved these bags so much! The next day, they wore them to school. I got so many thank you/ Christmas cards with emojis. I'm glad I was able to purchase a quality gift at a great price. The bags are strong enough to hold light jackets, school supplies ir snacks. Thanks for providing a great quality product that I could give my students.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags for party favors!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter's 8th birthday party favors - we wanted to get something the kids can use, not junky stuff. They were a hit - girls all loved the emoji bags! They appear pretty well made and designs are cute too. Definitely something that can be used when going to the pool or in summer camp.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for goodie bags for my son's 7th bday party. They are much bigger than I expected which is great and each one has their own type of emoji face. Very cute and I hope everyone likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Stasia

customer_reviews.title: Cute Design
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! We were thrilled with these! All the nieces and nephews received these bags stuffed full of old school toys. Surprised that the corners were reinforced and they are durable! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Brownie Troop
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Brownie troop to bring their manuals to our meetings. Our girls used them once a week and every one held up. I just bought a new set for this year. Because of Covid, the girls have to each have their own supplies rather than sharing. I look forward to them holding up for another year
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Curler

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy For Kids Gifts
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as part of a summer gift basket for kids classroom. They are fun and good quality for this kind of item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: Looked at the reviews for many similar bags and went with this one based on that. Found the bags to be sturdy; used at a party and the kids were tickled by the various emojis! Another nice touch that wasn't previously mentioned was that the bags were shipped inside of a nice zipper bag. We unfolded them and separated into piles to view the different styles. Would order these again!
customer_reviews.author: T Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold up for students who are a bit rough and tumble with things. So far, so good and my students love the emoji designs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McAuliffe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These bags were fun, cute, and the hit of the party. People had a way to bring the other prizes that they won, home with them.
customer_reviews.author: noro2000

customer_reviews.title: Goody bags for Disneyland
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price. I used these for our family trip to Disneyland. The quality is good. It is durable and the seams are sewed well. It does not feel or have that cheap look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: I received these bags last week. While they are ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these bags last week. While they are very cute and rather large, I have a few that already have snags in them and with them being for kids they will be trash soon enough. Not that I expected them to be a lasting item. I did however, expect them to arrive with no issues. I need these for our end of summer party so they will do for this daycare event, but if I ever order again and they arrive in this condition I will for sure be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The bags are high quality-made well, love how the bottom corners are reinforced. Bought these as give-a-ways for my daughter to give to her kindergarten classmates on her birthday. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Parties
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We used them as goodie bags for my daughter's 8 birthday. Inside we put a playground ball with the child's name written on it with a metallic marker. It went over great.
customer_reviews.author: Pearlann

customer_reviews.title: VERY CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bags- used them to hold "appreciation week" gifts for a group at work- everyone loved them. They are roomy and held a nice array of small gifts. Every bag was good and there were no defects.
customer_reviews.author: Nova18

customer_reviews.title: Hip and Cool, wonderful bags were enjoyed by all!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to give to the kids in our family on Christmas Eve at my home which I host every year. 12 were given out for ages 6 through 16 and they were a big hit with everyone. The bags were brightly colored and durable, holding perfectly the other gifts I placed inside. The emoji faces were unique and fun. It made me smile to see each emoji face as I said goodnight to each kid, who was proudly wearing it on their back :)
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marie McNamara

customer_reviews.title: ... (return gifts) for my daughter's birthday party and Kids LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a goody bags (return gifts) for my daughter's birthday party and Kids LOVED it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sushar

customer_reviews.title: These were great goody bags!!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are too cute and they were perfect for my emoji obsessed teen and her friends. Very cool and unlike I read in some reviews, all my bags arrived in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: La Tosca Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: These backpacks are great gifts. I'm using them as Easter Goody Bags ...
customer_reviews.text: These backpacks are great gifts. I'm using them as Easter Goody Bags for my 7 kids that range from 1-6 yrs. old. They will be great for everyday use. The different style emojis gave me an individual option for boys & girls.
customer_reviews.author: Suth'rnCharm

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Reusable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for gift bags for kids, and I saw this product. I love the fact that they are cute and reusable. Perfect size as well. Would buy again and mentioned themto many of my friends already.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dadush

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain, cute emoji back packs
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, arrived fast. The bags are bright and have the emoji faces pictured, the children loved them. They fit all the standard school materials such as binders and notebooks, even a laptop. Also great for the gym, looks sturdy, for the price, I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mabilina

customer_reviews.title: Cute and arrived in one day !!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them but they seem well made and sturdy !! They are pretty too! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kei.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They are adorable! I bought them as party favors for my son’s 8th birthday. Boy, were they a hit!! They arrived well packaged and very quickly. I even had kids ask for extra bags for their siblings! Definitely worth every penny-and more to see the happy faces on the kids when they got them!
customer_reviews.author: ProBuyer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with these bags I ordered them on a Friday ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these bags I ordered them on a Friday morning received them on a Tuesday afternoon at first I was not sure about some of the reviews but again I needed them for my little girls 10th birthday party ,the kids love the bags and so did some of parents ,yes I would recommend this company to anyone I ordered 10 and got 10 no issues what so ever with the bags
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: My kids use these bags for everything. And you get a lot for what you pay
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: These bags are absolutely adorable! The material is very nice quality and they ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are absolutely adorable! The material is very nice quality and they are the perfect size for kids and teens! The screen printing is also done nicely! They arrived very quickly too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: These made great gifts for the kids. They love the fun faces, and the bags are durable. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Not 'official' emoji's but still super cute. Plus a great price. These are going to make the perfect party favors for my daughter's birthday party, and I love that they are unisex. The seem to be well made, with strong stitching and the screen printing is done well. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Stylist&Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags
customer_reviews.text: I am using these for A kids birthday party great items for them to put all their party bags and treats in Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Junier

customer_reviews.title: Better than a paper bag
customer_reviews.text: These drawstring bags were a hit with the kids who attended my 7 year old granddaughter's birthday party. They are on the large side so we bought several larger favors to fill up the bags. I like that they are re-usable rather than throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Good size. Exactly as pictured from other reviewers!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a big hit @ my son's 10th bday! Don't hesitate on this. Thank you to everyone who took the time to review. Helps buying decisions most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: sheklein

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and very adorable. Used as party favors for my kids bday party and the kids had tons of fun choosing the emoji they wanted again. Will definitely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags for the price. Big enough to fit all the Easter gifts I bought for 9 grandkids including medium sized stuffed animals and toys. Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great seller
customer_reviews.text: Update: seller sent replacement bags. I would definitely buy from them again. Original review: One bag had a defect and the strap unraveled, upsetting on of the girls. I'm glad I had one extra. I'm not sure if these are durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great for party favor bags
customer_reviews.text: They were a hit and had lots of room to stuff them with goodies! And even kids clothes from our pool party
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are of a good material considering the price and are large enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute. They are of a good material considering the price and are large enough for even a 10 year old to wear them on the back. I filled these with a few small toys and gave them to kids at my son's birthday party. The kids loved them, even the 13 year old boys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for party favor
customer_reviews.text: ordered two sets of this for our daughter's 4 years old birthday. inexpensive and practical gift compare to those bubbles, cheap crayons, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TREEHOUSE

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered some from another company and they were broken with holes so I ordered these too and I LOVE THE EMOJI BAGS
customer_reviews.author: En la Calle

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for an end of year class gift and I was happy with the product. There were larger than expected and seem to be made well. I only needed to retie a single bag where the string had come loose. They were adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M

customer_reviews.title: they were a great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: They were a huge hit. My grandaughter had an Emoji themed party for her 10th birthday, they were a great size and weight...so surprised at the low costs for the great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Nahni58

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for gift bags!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son's 4th birthday party to give out instead of gift bags. All the kids LOVED them and I see they are still using them weeks after the party. Great price point, great quality, great bag. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ross

customer_reviews.title: The bags were great for birthday party giveaways
customer_reviews.text: The bags were great for birthday party giveaways! They are sturdy and each one of them is different in design. Loved it !
customer_reviews.author: Shopper P

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I used these as prizes for a game we played at our Easter party and they were a hit. They are pretty durable for a nap-sack.
customer_reviews.author: Marioyes

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bags with reinforced corners
customer_reviews.text: Very cute designs. Many loved the pirate. The bags are better than others I ordered for my daughter's birthday favors.
customer_reviews.author: azngurl884

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids both big and small.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this is not a five star is due to how thin the material is and I thought I could use for a few school books; not the case. The bag size is good for one pair of shoes and a shirt; something not too heavy. I do like them. They're fun, you know the smiley face/silly face emojis. Who wouldn't like those. :)
customer_reviews.author: dmb8969

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Used these for party favors. The kids were thrilled to receive them with other presents inside. Nicely made and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great. Exactly like pictured and my grandkids will enjoy getting their Christmas presents in these rather than boring old Christmas wrap!!! And they can use them for a lot of things after that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time for my daughter's birthday party. She gave one to each of her guests as a favor, filled with a decent-sized water gun, goggles and a small ziplock of candy. Everyone got to pick their favorite emoji. Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Stell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These bags are very cute. Much more durable than expected. Used them in our favor baskets for 11th birthday party. Kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara June

customer_reviews.title: Party favor
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and good quality! I was pleasantly surprised. These bags were used as party favors for my son's Emoji themed birthday party and all the kids went absolutely crazy for them! I also loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lenishka

customer_reviews.title: Really  happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. They are just As described. They seem like a good quality. We have not give them to the kids yet so only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: j.koszy

customer_reviews.title: Large!
customer_reviews.text: Love,love, love! Great color and size. Using for bucket #6 prize in bucket game!

customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase of bags. The quality is great and the delivery was smooth (on time etc). We are using our bags as a birthday party goodie bag.

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: Kids freaked out over these at my sons bday party. Used them as party favor bags! Wel made and a good size!

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags! Great buy for the price :)
customer_reviews.text: The bags are big enough to hold a bunch of stuff. The strings are sturdy and well made. Super cute and perfect for party favors. Bags can also be used for everyday activities. I highly recommend this product. A+++

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was so happy.. going to purchase another set
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute :) :)..My daughter was so happy..going to purchase another set....Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: These bags were perfect for favor bags for my little girls' bday party. It was unicorn themed and I had unicorn bags similar to this but we wanted an alternative for the boys. They loved these bags and we paired them with plush emoji keychains and used them to collect the candy from the piñata. It was a good option for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: 3and3

customer_reviews.title: Great party bags!!
customer_reviews.text: They are such good mini back packs!! I ordered them for my daughters 3 year old birthday party which I used them for party favors for the kids.. every kid loves them!!! Would order them again for next year!!

customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for several full size bags

customer_reviews.text: These bags were great! I’m a teacher and I bought these as Christmas presents for my students! I stuffed them with gifts and my students loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy227

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I expected. They matched the photos in the advertisement perfectly.! Sturdy and good quality material. I'm very happy with this purchase. Maybe nix the pirate face but great otherwise.

customer_reviews.title: great bags. good quality
customer_reviews.text: great bags. good quality. I used them as godie bags for my daughter's 12th birthday and The kids like them so much that I ordered more to use as skipper bag for a local youth sailing regatta.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bags! I bought them as a party favor for 7/8 year olds and they loved them. Well made!

customer_reviews.title: They were a hit and the kids loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bags as party favor bags for my 9 year old's birthday party and I loved them! The kids loved them as well. The bags are bright, cute and nicely sized. You can fit a lot of party favors in them and afterwards still use them as sturdy bags. I had other parents ask where I had bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Quantity
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but I only received 9 instead of 10 😕

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast with delivery! Quality is better than the other emoji drawstring backpacks that I got! Im very satisfied! So durable! I used this as a give aways tokens for my kids’ bday party.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product. My Girl Scouts used these to make chemo care bags to donate to a chemo center for girls their age entering treatment.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I purchased these bags for my daughter’s 10th birthday party and used them as treat bags. The kids all loved them.

customer_reviews.text: Okay, these have got to be the cutest bags for the price that I’ve ever seen! They are made well, very sturdy, and so brightly printed! So glad I ordered them!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: No cheap material!  Size of a backpack.
customer_reviews.text: They were prefect. Exactly as advertised. I used them as "goody bags" for a birthday party. Filled them with huge plush emoji slippers, standard notebook size journal, makeup and spa products and still had plenty of room. The kids later used them as bookbags/backpack.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: Great little bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved them!! I bought these to put in birthday gift bags. Kids ages range from 2 - 9 years old. The older kids seemed more excited for these. They are cute and great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin F.

customer_reviews.title: Great string backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bags as birthday party favors. They are awesome and the kids loved them. They appear to be of pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These came fast and are really cute. Can't wait to give them out at my daughter's party.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: The bags are a great size, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my child's class for end of the school year gifts. The bags are a great size, sturdy, and have great emojis.
customer_reviews.author: Irene V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for party favor bags! I thought they might be made with that flimsy fabric material, but they are not. They are more of a waterproofed vinyl type with plenty of room and cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: Jones205

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Emoji bags! You can't go wrong! They have reinforced corners. And you get several for a great price. This is an excellent deal!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rusher

customer_reviews.title: nice product love them.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product for elementary kids. I got it as a return gift for my 7 year old kid. Quality is good and Kids loved them. Drawstring back pack with different emojis can be later used as a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: DEEPIKA

customer_reviews.title: Emoji bags 😃
customer_reviews.text: Totally loved these bags! I used them as a gift bags for my kids birthday party! I put shower puffs, candy, and some other goodies. Totally recommend, and they double as an overnight bag for your kids next sleepover. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Song C. Lopez
